newsitem.title: USA: Hycor Bio board okays 800,000 shr buyback.
newsitem.headline: Hycor Bio board okays 800,000 shr buyback.

text.p: Hycor Biomedical Inc said Tuesday its board has authorized the renewal of the company's stock repurchase program with an approval to buy back an additional 800,000 common shares in the open market.
Hycor completed its previous 820,000 share buyback plan last week, it said.
The company had approximately 7.5 million shares outstanding.
